keyMoments.title: Olvia Arrives at the Tree of Knowledge
keyMoments.description: Olvia appears in person at the Tree of Knowledge library, revealing herself to the scholars after arriving on the Marine ship.
keyMoments.significance: First full appearance of Olvia in the story, establishing her as a real character rather than just a name or wanted poster.

keyMoments.title: Olvia Reveals the Fate of the Expedition
keyMoments.description: Olvia tells the scholars that all members of the Poneglyph expedition were killed by the World Government, with her being the sole survivor.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the World Government's ruthlessness and establishes the danger facing all of Ohara.
keyMoments.quote: Everyone who left the island to search for Poneglyphs... they were all killed by the World Government. I'm the only survivor.

keyMoments.title: Olvia Chooses Not to Reveal Herself to Robin
keyMoments.description: Despite learning Robin is on the island, Olvia decides not to reveal her identity to protect Robin from being branded a criminal.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Olvia's maternal love and sacrifice, choosing Robin's safety over her own desire for reunion.
keyMoments.quote: I won't reveal myself to Robin. I don't want her to be branded a criminal because of me.

keyMoments.title: Olvia Shoots Spandine
keyMoments.description: When confronted by Spandine, Olvia shoots him with a pistol in defiance, though the bullet only goes through his sleeve.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Olvia's courage and willingness to resist the World Government despite overwhelming odds.

keyMoments.title: Olvia is Captured by CP9
keyMoments.description: CP9 agents overpower and capture Olvia along with the other scholars of Ohara.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the end for Ohara's scholars and sets up the tragic conclusion.

bounties.reason: Researching Poneglyphs and the Void Century

relationships.description: Olvia is Robin's mother who left to research Poneglyphs when Robin was young.

evolutionMoments.description: Olvia learns Robin is on Ohara but chooses not to reveal herself to protect her daughter from persecution.

relationships.description: Fellow archaeologist and scholar at Ohara who studied the Poneglyphs.
Saul helped Olvia escape from Marine custody before she returned to Ohara.

reveals.information: Olvia was part of an expedition to find Poneglyphs, and all other members were killed by the World Government
Returned to Ohara to warn the scholars of the World Government's plan to exterminate them

keyMoments.title: Robin Shares Her Dream
keyMoments.description: Robin tells Saul about her dream to become an archaeologist and study the Void Century and Poneglyphs like her mother.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Robin's early motivation and connection to forbidden knowledge that will define her life.
keyMoments.quote: I want to become an archaeologist and study the Void Century. My mother was studying the Poneglyphs.

keyMoments.title: Robin's Mother is Revealed to Saul
keyMoments.description: Saul learns that Robin is the daughter of Nico Olvia, the archaeologist he helped escape.
keyMoments.significance: Connects Robin directly to Saul's desertion and establishes the protective relationship between them.

relationships.description: Robin's mother who left to research Poneglyphs. Robin dreams of meeting her one day.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin tells Saul about her mother and her hope to meet her, unaware that Olvia is nearby on the island.

relationships.description: Saul befriended young Robin and becomes her protector during the Ohara Incident.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin opens up to Saul about her dreams and her mother, deepening their friendship.

reveals.information: Wants to become an archaeologist and study the Void Century like her mother

name.japanese: ハグワール・D・サウロ

keyMoments.title: Saul Learns Robin is Olvia's Daughter
keyMoments.description: Saul is shocked to discover that Robin is the daughter of Nico Olvia, the woman he helped escape from the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation connects Saul's desertion directly to Robin's story, showing how his actions to save Olvia led him to her daughter.

keyMoments.title: Saul Warns Robin of Danger
keyMoments.description: Realizing the Marines have come to eliminate the scholars, Saul warns Robin that she must survive no matter what.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Saul's protective role and foreshadows his sacrifice to save Robin.
keyMoments.quote: The Marines are here to eliminate all the scholars. You must survive, Robin!

relationships.description: Saul becomes Robin's protector after learning she is Olvia's daughter.

evolutionMoments.description: Saul realizes Robin is in grave danger and vows to protect her, transitioning from friend to guardian.

relationships.description: Saul helped Olvia escape from Marine custody, which led him to Ohara.

reveals.information: Realizes he is on the island of Ohara

keyMoments.title: Clover Reunites with Olvia
keyMoments.description: Professor Clover reunites with Olvia when she arrives at the Tree of Knowledge to warn the scholars.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the bond between the Ohara scholars and their shared dedication to uncovering historical truth.

keyMoments.title: Clover and the Scholars are Rounded Up
keyMoments.description: Clover and the other scholars are captured by CP9 as they raid the Tree of Knowledge.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the World Government's systematic destruction of Ohara's knowledge keepers.

relationships.description: Fellow archaeologist and scholar studying the Poneglyphs and Void Century.
Clover allowed young Robin to pursue archaeological studies despite her age.

keyMoments.title: Spandine Arrives at Ohara with CP9
keyMoments.description: Spandine leads CP9 forces to Ohara to arrest the scholars and suppress their research into the Poneglyphs.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Spandine as the face of the World Government's brutal suppression of knowledge.

keyMoments.title: Spandine is Shot by Olvia
keyMoments.description: Olvia shoots Spandine with a pistol, though the bullet only goes through his sleeve. Spandine dramatically overreacts.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Spandine's cowardly nature and Olvia's defiant spirit.

keyMoments.title: Spandine Discovers the Hidden Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: CP9 under Spandine's command discovers the hidden basement containing a Poneglyph being studied by the scholars.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the World Government with evidence to justify their extreme actions against Ohara.

relationships.description: Spandine leads the operation to capture Olvia and the Ohara scholars.
Spandine is responsible for arresting Clover and the other scholars of Ohara.

reveals.information: Shown to be cowardly and dramatic, overreacting to a minor wound
